snippet: Shares of Monitise, a British mobile payment developer and processor, lost more than a quarter of their value on Thursday after Visa said it was evaluating what to do with its stake in the company.
abstract: Shares of Monitise, a British mobile payment developer and processor, lost more than a quarter of their value on Thursday after Visa said it was evaluating what to do with its stake in the company.

headline.main: Visa to Evaluate Stake in Monitise, a British Mobile Payment Processor
